text:
:mega::mega::mega: Hello everyone! As part of helping you build more powerful extensions, we want to do an *Alpha of the Panel component* with about 10-15 developers.

*What is a Panel?* A component that will slide open over the main page, giving you more space to present detailed information (see GIF below). It can be used to abstract information, perform data-related actions, avoid crowding the main page, and much more!

*What can you expect in this Alpha?*
• You’ll be given access to the Panel component and can play around with it as you wish. You will be committing to trying out this component
• We expect you to provide detailed feedback within 1-2 weeks of getting access through a 20-30 minute Zoom call and active participation in this Slack channel
*Next steps:* Please fill out <https://forms.gle/Xwiu2H3ZY8sT368FA|this form> by *27th October* if you wish to participate. We will be choosing the first 10-15 participants.
I think this feature would be very useful <@U03FJQPSC0Y> - some users don't want to use Dropbox, but rather upload files directly to the attached contact/deal

Thanks <@U03FJQPSC0Y> for including me here. I think the idea from <@U01QVR44MEY> to open an iframe to upload file works for us. It gives us flexibility to upload huge files and perform any kind of post processing
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> it would be great if one of the sample projects had an open iframe feature to get an idea of how to do it easily

Are file downloads and/or copy to clipboard capability supported with extensions? On a button click in extension, we want to call a serverless function which will then call 3rd party APIs to get the data.

Hey :wave:
Is there a library of Figma/Sketch/Adobe XD elements available for download?
We’d love to have some non-technical people mock up CRM customisations, but it’s proving tricky without easy building blocks.
